statements: SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT sender, receiver, message FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver = 'Alice';
SELECT sender, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender FROM communication_logs;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT log_id, sender, receiver FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Charlie' AND receiver = 'David' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Eve' OR receiver = 'Mallory';
SELECT DISTINCT sender FROM communication_logs WHERE message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, mission_control_message FROM communication_logs;
SELECT astronaut_id, first_name, last_name FROM astronauts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, mission_count FROM astronauts ORDER BY mission_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE mission_control_message LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT astronaut_id, first_name, last_name FROM astronauts WHERE mission_count > 5 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, astronaut_message, log_timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT astronaut_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, mission_count FROM astronauts WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY mission_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender, recipient FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND recipient = 'Bob';
SELECT control_name, location FROM mission_control WHERE location = 'Mars';
SELECT astronaut_name, role FROM astronauts WHERE role = 'Captain' OR role = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender='John Doe' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT control_name, location FROM mission_control WHERE location='Space Station Alpha';
SELECT astronaut_name, role FROM astronauts WHERE mission_id=2 AND role='Engineer';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE recipient='Jane Smith' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT control_name, location FROM mission_control ORDER BY control_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, start_date, end_date FROM missions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT control_name, location FROM mission_control WHERE location = 'Houston';
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality, age FROM astronauts WHERE age > 30;
SELECT mission_id, astronaut_id, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM missions ORDER BY start_date DESC, mission_name ASC;
SELECT mission_name, start_date, end_date FROM missions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' AND mission_name ILIKE 'Apollo%';
SELECT astronauast_name, nationality, age FROM astronauts WHERE nationality = 'USA' OR nationality = 'Russia' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT control_name, location, contact_number FROM mission_control WHERE location IN ('Houston', 'Cape Canaveral');

SELECT missions.mission_id, missions.mission_name, communication_logs.timestamp, communication_logs.message FROM missions JOIN communication_logs ON missions.mission_id = communication_logs.mission_id WHERE communication_logs.astronaut_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Astronauts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Astronauts WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, destination FROM MissionControl ORDER BY mission_id DESC;
SELECT astronaut_id, first_name, last_name, job_title FROM Astronauts WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT status_id, mission_id, status, details, update_time FROM MissionStatus WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Astronauts ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality FROM Astronauts WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT mission_name, destination, launch_date, arrival_date FROM MissionControl WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM MissionControlCommunicationLogs WHERE astronaut_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT training_type, training_date FROM AstronautTraining WHERE training_date < '2022-09-01';
